name: ZokaDice - Yahtzee with Friend
description:
ZokaDice is the game of luck and strategy. Game play is simple and familiar as offered by games like Yahtzee.

Let the dice roll in this exciting game of chance and strategy. Challenge friends or meet new people from all over the world, while enjoying this great, familiar game.
____________________________________
FEATURES:
+ Simple and familiar five dice game play, as offered by games like Yahtzee
+ Play a quick classic game, go full in with triple mode or join a party mode game for massive multiplayer dice fun
+ Play the same game with the same people over mobile and tablet
+ Invite your friends or meet new people over a relaxing game of dice
